articles.description: COLUMBUS (WCMH) — Due to the increase of COVID-19 cases, hospitals in central Ohio have announced a return to a no-visitor policy. The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center, OhioHealth and Mount Carmel Health System announced they will temporarily stop …
